Not always. Buuuuut making a habit out of it is a bad idea.

topics.body:
So guess who isn't fired?! *ME! ME! ME!*
!http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lrfc2wVqg41qkcjl0.gif!


So why am I not fired?  My boss tried to have the other guy see if he could figure out how to do my job; the guy took one look athe programs and shit and went "I have no idea how to do any of this".

Sometimes being a nerd pays off cause sometimes if you have a shit paying job there's a overwhelming chance that nobody else will know how to do your job at all.

Tl:dr; boss tried to fire me, but nobody knew how to do my job so I'm unfired.
